verses.text: I will lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* unto the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*, from \w whence|strong="H0370"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* my \w help|strong="H5828"\w*.\f + \fr 121.1 \ft I willâ€¦: or, Shall I lift up mine eyes to the hills? whence should my help come?\f*
My \w help|strong="H5828"\w* \add cometh\add* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
He will not \w suffer|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* to be \w moved|strong="H4132"\w*: he that \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* thee will not \w slumber|strong="H5123"\w*.
Behold, he that \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall neither \w slumber|strong="H5123"\w* nor \w sleep|strong="H3462"\w*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* thy \w keeper|strong="H8104"\w*: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* thy \w shade|strong="H6738"\w* upon thy \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.
The \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* shall not \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* thee by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, nor the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w preserve|strong="H8104"\w* thee from all \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: he shall \w preserve|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w preserve|strong="H8104"\w* thy going \w out|strong="H3318"\w* and thy coming \w in|strong="H0935"\w* from this time forth, and even \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*.
